about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT

Official soundtrack of Gacha Fever the bullet heaven developed by Milkshake Games and Leelith
This album covers 12 original and unique tracks from the game including boss theme tracks and background level music.

Artists & composers: Elodie Côme (Leelith)

TRACK LISTING

- All my fellas ! - Slime street Theme
- King slime - Slime street boss Theme
- Welcome to the smile parade ! - Menu Theme
- Fluffy nightmare - Temple boss Theme
- Thank you ! - Final Theme
- The 3S - Beach boss Theme
- T-Rex - Arcade boss Theme
- Creepy bunny - Temple Theme
- Get the party started ! - Void boss Theme
- Gimme Gimme - Arcade Theme
- Low and high - Hub Theme
- Summer time ! - Beach Theme

This is additional content for Gacha Fever, but does not include the base game.
